title: Grant Schoen Beginners Tournament
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: The 2022 Grant Schoen Beginners Tournament, held on Sunday, March 6th, was a great success. We were able to honor the memory of Grant Schoen and raise awareness for HeartSafe Wisconsin. At the same time, we gave 240 beginner wrestlers a chance to experience live wrestling in a tournament, some for the first …

title: Ben Peterson Visit
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: Olympic gold medalist, Ben Peterson, conducted practice and shared his wrestling experience and knowledge with the Matdogs.

title: Germantown
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: There were 19 Matdogs at the Germantown Hornet's Youth Wrestling Tournament Saturday, 2/1/20. The team took home 2nd place, just missing first by 1/2 point. Individual places: 1st place champions: Adam Jr., Brady, Alden, Cael, William, Bailey 2nd place: Samuel, Jade, Ryan, Noah 3rd place: Evie, Landen, Charlie, Evan 4th place: Colson, Cora, Bohdan, Seamus, Andranik Thanks coaches, family and fans …

title: Sheboygan Slam
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: There were 18 Matdogs at the Sheboygan Slam Sunday, 1/26/20. It turned out to be a marathon of waiting, as it was a first time event. The Matdogs stuck it out and hit the mats. Individual places: 1st place champions: Brady, Adam Jr., Lucas, Ryan, Cora and Keegan 2nd place: Cael and Louis 3rd place: Beau, Landen and Gavin 4th place: William 5th …

title: Week 3
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: The third week into the season, there were Matdogs at two different tournaments. Saturday, there were 5 Matdogs at the Sussex Sabercat "Tear It Up" Tournament. Adam Jr., Ryan and Wyatt took 2nd, and Landen and Evan took 3rd. Good job, boys! Sunday, there were 10 Matdogs at Slinger's first Beginners Tournament. This was a very first …

title: Cedarburg vs Port
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: Thursday night was Youth Wrestling Night and CHS Senior Night at the CHS wrestling meet against Port Washington. The Cedarburg Matdogs took on the Port Washington Piranhas in exhibition matches prior to the varsity match. This was a great chance for the younger wrestlers to see what a high school match looks like. It was also …

title: Hartford 2020
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: There were 21 Matdogs at the Hartford Youth Tournament on Sunday 1/12/20. Individual places: 1st place champions: Brady, Cora, Bailey 2nd place: Elijah, Adam Jr., Colson, Ryan, Beau, Keegan 3rd place: Lucas, Caleb, William, Jacob, Noah 4th place: Tyler, Cael, Parker, Landen, Evan 5th place: Alden 6th place: Gavin Thanks coaches, family and fans for your support.

title: West Bend 2020
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: To kick off the tournament season, there were 17 Matdogs at the West Bend Youth Tournament on Sunday 1/5/20. First place champions took home a custom resin wildcat trophy. Individual places: 1st place champions: William, Cael, Dominic, Adam, Brady 2nd place: Landen, Evan, Ryan 3rd place: Louis, Keegan, Bailey 4th place: Charlie, Cora, Patrick, Joseph, Lucas 5th place: Evie Thanks coaches, family …

title: 2020 Registration
author: Yvette Roller
excerpt: Online registration is open now. TO REGISTER click here For more club info click here We will have in-person registration Tuesday, Dec. 10th, 6-7pm in the CHS Wrestling Room.
